item.title: ARTS-WEEK 1
item.description: Algorithm LeetCode 的第一题，比较简单。就是给一个数组，一个目标结果，返回数组中两个相加和为目标数的索引。 Given an array of integers, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to a specific target. You may assume that each input would have exactly one solution, and you may not use the same element twice. Example: Given nums = [2, 7, 11, 15], target = 9, Because nums[0] + nums[1] = 2 + 7 = 9, return [0, 1]. 因为没有做过算法题，所以刚开始的思路就是跟简单排序一样，拿出第一个数，然后轮询后面的数，并相加，看它们的和是否等于目标数，不等于就拿出第二个数往后，等于就返回索引。
